prod_short_desc: Have fun at the seaside with Stephanie and Andrea!
prod_long_desc:
Splash around at the LEGO® Friends beach with Stephanie and Andrea, featuring an Easy to Build speedboat, dock with slide, smoothie stand, loungers, shower and assorted accessories to create a perfect, fun-packed day out in the sun. LEGO Juniors is an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 4-7. Includes two mini-doll figures and a dolphin figure.
Includes two mini-doll figures: Stephanie and Andrea, plus a dolphin figure.
Features an Easy to Build beach scene with sun loungers and shower, floating speedboat with steering wheel and refrigerator, dock with slide and mooring rope, and a smoothie stand with dual-function transparent window.
Race Stephanie and Andrea around in the speedboat and chase the dolphin after them!
Sit down at the smoothie stand and flip the window to use as a table.
Relax on the loungers and keep cool with a cold drink under the umbrella.
Easy to Build model with bigger pieces and a simple guide to get kids building and playing quickly.
Accessory elements include two adjustable sun loungers, assorted fruit (pineapple, banana, apple and berries) and blender, two life jackets, pair of flippers, two cups, sun lotion bottle, two popsicles and a telescope.
The speedboat floats!
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 4-7.
Beach scene and smoothie stand measures over 3” high, 7” wide and 2” long.
Speedboat measures over 1” high, 5” long and 2” wide.
Dock with slide measures over 3” high, 4” wide and 2” long.
